name: js-game-engine
description: A modular 3D game engine with Android export capabilities

scripts.android: npm run build && cap sync android && cap open android
scripts.android:build: npm run build && cap sync android
scripts.android:apk: npm run build && cap sync android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug && cd ..
scripts.docs: echo Documentation is in docs/ folder. See docs/README.md for main docs.
scripts.ios: npm run build && cap sync ios && cap open ios
